isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - ENGINE FRONT COVER AND/OR GASKET; R & R OR REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: ENGINE FRONT COVER AND/OR GASKET; R & R OR REPLACE
wtsproc.config: This guideline is for R & R of front section only. It is not necessary to remove oil pan or open A/C or Power Steering systems.

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Disconnect battery.
Remove front bumper assembly.
Raise vehicle and place wood blocks under tires for clearance.
Open hood.
Disconnect hood wiring harness and remove hood assembly.
Remove charge air cooler hoses.
Drain cooling system.
Disconnect power steering reservoir from radiator frame and secure out of way.
Remove or disconnect all coolant hoses necessary to remove radiator assembly with surge tank attached.
Remove upper radiator stay rods and disconnect lower stay rods at frame.
Remove fan clutch assembly.
Disconnect air conditioning condenser from radiator assembly and secure out of the way.
Remove radiator assembly with surge tank attached.
Remove serpentine belt(s) and tensioner.
Remove fan driven pulley and hub.
Remove crankshaft damper using puller.
Remove oil pump assembly including drift key.
Remove water pump drive pulley and pump assembly.
Remove camshaft position sensor.
Remove coolant filter for access.
Remove alternator mounting bracket with alternator attached.
Remove power steering pump (or air compressor if equipped) bolts from front cover.

note.para: Do not open power steering system.

step1.para: Remove front engine bracket bolts retaining bracket to cross member.
Position bottle jack and raise engine.

note.para: Position jack to allow for rotation of crankshaft.

step1.para: Remove front engine bracket from front cover/block
Remove front section of front cover assembly..
Clean all gasket and mating surfaces before installation.
Install front section of front cover assembly and torque to spec.
Install front engine bracket to front cover/block and lower engine.
Install front engine bracket bolts retaining bracket to cross member.
Install power steering pump (or air compressor if equipped) bolts to front cover and torque to spec.
Replace front seal wear ring and install heating iron to crankshaft damper to prep for installation.
Install alternator mounting bracket with alternator attached.
Install camshaft position sensor.
Install water pump assembly and torque to spec.
Install water pump drive pulley and torque to spec.
Install coolant filter.
Replace front seal and install oil pump assembly including drift key and torque to spec.
Install heated crankshaft damper and torque to spec.

note.para: Wear protective gloves when handling damper.

step1.para: Install driven fan pulley and hub and torque to spec.
Install belt tensioner and belt(s).
Connect lower radiator hose to front cover.

note.para: Do not tighten clamp at this time.

step1.para: Install radiator assembly using lifting device and install lower mount nut.
Connect A/C condenser to radiator assembly.
Install fan clutch assembly.
Connect lower radiator stay rods and install upper stay rods.
Install all coolant hoses necessary to complete installation.
Connect power steering reservoir to radiator frame.
Install charge air cooler hoses.
Fill cooling system.
Remove wood blocks and lower vehicle.
Check and fill engine oil level.
Install hood assembly and connect hood wiring harness.
Connect battery cables.
Install front bumper assembly.
Start engine. Check operation and check for leaks.
Top off all fluids.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks.
